edge_1: While looting a mall, Corbyn calls Perkins and makes a deal for the release of Moreno and Breeze as long as she opens the vault and gets the money. When Perkins asks where the trade will be conducted, Corbyn tells him to meet them at the Gulfport mall.
edge_2: With the eye of the storm passing, Perkins and his men take the money, using three of the facility's truck trailers, along with Corbyn.

edge_2: After Perkins' own detached trailer crushes him, the money is sucked into the storm along with one of the trucks.

edge_1: After Will talks to Breeze, who has arrived with the mercenaries, Corbyn shoots the glass roof, sucking the mercenaries out into the storm as planned. Corbyn, Will, and Breeze manage to hold on.
